title: Harry Kane Surpassed Cristiano Ronaldo in This Scoring Milestone
desc: In an era shaped by legendary goal scorers, Harry Kane continues to carve out his own place in football history. The Bayern Munich forward reached 500 official career goals, a milestone reserved for the game’s elite finishers. What makes the achievement even more striking is the speed at which the England captain reached it, surpassing the pace set by Cristiano Ronaldo when he hit the same total.
